Detailed Description

DMA Channel structure

Field Documentation

uint8_t CUSBDMA_DmaChannel_s::channelStalled

Flag indicated whether this channel is stalled

CUSBDMA_DmaController* CUSBDMA_DmaChannel_s::controller

Pointer to DMA controller

uint32_t CUSBDMA_DmaChannel_s::currentStreamID

Stream ID of the current stream

uint8_t CUSBDMA_DmaChannel_s::dmultEnabled

field holds dmult configuration for channel

uint32_t CUSBDMA_DmaChannel_s::epConfig

EP_CFG register for this channel

uint8_t CUSBDMA_DmaChannel_s::hwUsbEppNum

USB EP number. It can be different then channel number

uint8_t CUSBDMA_DmaChannel_s::isDirTx

Flag indicating if transfer direction is transmit

max TD length

for private use

status

Virtual address of transfer ring base

uintptr_t CUSBDMA_DmaChannel_s::trbBufferBaseAddrPhy

Physical address of transfer ring base

uint32_t CUSBDMA_DmaChannel_s::trbBufferDequeueIdx

Last known Index where the next TRB would be read by HW.

int32_t CUSBDMA_DmaChannel_s::trbBufferDmultDelinkIdx

Index where the TRB chain is intentionally De-linked in DMULT mode

uint32_t CUSBDMA_DmaChannel_s::trbBufferEnqueueIdx

Index where the next TRB will be written by SW

uint32_t CUSBDMA_DmaChannel_s::trbBufferSize

Size of the TRB buffer

uint32_t CUSBDMA_DmaChannel_s::trbChainDescBufferSz

Size of the TRB chain descriptor buffer size

CUSBDMA_DmaTrbChainDesc* CUSBDMA_DmaChannel_s::trbChainDescListHead

Pointer to the TRB chain desc list head for this channel

uint32_t CUSBDMA_DmaChannel_s::trbChainDescReadIdx

Index where the next TRB would be read by HW

uint32_t CUSBDMA_DmaChannel_s::trbChainDescWriteIdx

Index where the next TRB would be written by SW

uint32_t CUSBDMA_DmaChannel_s::trbCycleBit

Cycle bit for the next write TRB

uint16_t CUSBDMA_DmaChannel_s::wMaxPacketSize

Max packet size for this channel
